name: zxcvbn-czech
description: realistic password strength estimation with czech dictionaries
author: Original author Dan Wheeler, modification by Lubos Pavlicek

scripts.build: npm run build-frequency ; npm run build-keyboard ; npm run build-lib ; npm run build-dist
scripts.watch: npm run watch-lib & npm run watch-dist
scripts.build-dist: browserify --debug  --standalone zxcvbn -t coffeeify --extension='.coffee' -t uglifyify src/main.coffee | exorcist --base . dist/zxcvbn.js.map >| dist/zxcvbn.js
scripts.build-cs: npm run build-frequency-cs ; npm run build-keyboard-cs ; npm run build-lib ; npm run build-dist-cs
scripts.build-dist-cs: browserify --debug  --standalone zxcvbn -t coffeeify --extension='.coffee' -t uglifyify src/main.coffee | exorcist --base . dist/zxcvbn.js.map >| dist/zxcvbn_cs.js
scripts.build-cs-small: npm run build-frequency-cs-small ; npm run build-keyboard-cs-small ; npm run build-lib ; npm run build-dist-cs-small
scripts.build-dist-cs-small: browserify --debug  --standalone zxcvbn -t coffeeify --extension='.coffee' -t uglifyify src/main.coffee | exorcist --base . dist/zxcvbn.js.map >| dist/zxcvbn_cs_small.js
scripts.build-sk: npm run build-frequency-sk ; npm run build-keyboard-sk ; npm run build-lib ; npm run build-dist-sk
scripts.build-dist-sk: browserify --debug  --standalone zxcvbn -t coffeeify --extension='.coffee' -t uglifyify src/main.coffee | exorcist --base . dist/zxcvbn.js.map >| dist/zxcvbn_sk.js
scripts.watch-dist: watchify --debug -v --standalone zxcvbn -t coffeeify --extension='.coffee' -t uglifyify src/main.coffee -o 'exorcist --base . dist/zxcvbn.js.map >| dist/zxcvbn.js'
